text:
I led a letter with @RepAOC and @SenSanders demanding this Administration end sanctions against Iran during the COVID-19 pandemic. 

These sanctions aren’t changing the behavior of the Iranian government, but directly punishing innocent civilians. 
https://t.co/odymQAN3cn
